title: New: GEMS – Pegasus
content:
With their SXSW debut fast approaching, Washington D.

C. duo Gems have unveiled their third completed track, in the form of Pegasus, premiered via our good friend Disco Naïveté. Continuing in the dreamy Beach House meets Cocteau Twins vein that originally garnered them such a flurry of attention, Pegasus is more intimate and all the more accesible for it. It’s considered, vaguely intoxicating and a hugely promising sign of what the group have in store for the future. The internal dialogue between the Clifford and Lindsay isn’t too disimilar to that found on Coexist, the most recent record from The XX, in the documenting a gradually breaking and fragmented relationship.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
